And the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, set<S>7760</S> thy face<S>6440</S> toward Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, and drop<S>5197</S> thy word toward the holy places<S>4720</S>, and prophesy<S>5012</S> against the land<S>127</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>,
And say<S>559</S> to the land<S>127</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; Behold, I am against thee, and will draw forth<S>3318</S> my sword<S>2719</S> out of his sheath<S>8593</S>, and will cut off<S>3772</S> from thee the righteous<S>6662</S> and the wicked<S>7563</S>.
Seeing<S>3282</S> then that I will cut off<S>3772</S> from thee the righteous<S>6662</S> and the wicked<S>7563</S>, therefore shall my sword<S>2719</S> go forth<S>3318</S> out of his sheath<S>8593</S> against all flesh<S>1320</S> from the south<S>5045</S> to the north<S>6828</S>:
That all flesh<S>1320</S> may know<S>3045</S> that I the LORD<S>3068</S> have drawn forth<S>3318</S> my sword<S>2719</S> out of his sheath<S>8593</S>: it shall not return<S>7725</S> any more.
Sigh<S>584</S> therefore, thou son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, with the breaking<S>7670</S> of thy loins<S>4975</S>; and with bitterness<S>4814</S> sigh<S>584</S> before their eyes<S>5869</S>.
And it shall be, when they say<S>559</S> unto thee, Wherefore sighest<S>584</S> thou? that thou shalt answer<S>559</S>, For the tidings<S>8052</S>; because it cometh<S>935</S>: and every heart<S>3820</S> shall melt<S>4549</S>, and all hands<S>3027</S> shall be feeble<S>7503</S>, and every spirit<S>7307</S> shall faint<S>3543</S>, and all knees<S>1290</S> shall be weak<S>3212</S> as water<S>4325</S>: behold, it cometh<S>935</S>, and shall be brought to pass<S>1961</S>, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>. <sup>shall be weak: Heb. shall go into water</sup>
Again the word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me, saying<S>559</S>,
Son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, prophesy<S>5012</S>, and say<S>559</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the LORD<S>3068</S>; Say<S>559</S>, A sword<S>2719</S>, a sword<S>2719</S> is sharpened<S>2300</S>, and also furbished<S>4803</S>:
It is sharpened<S>2300</S> to make a sore<S>2874</S> slaughter<S>2873</S>; it is furbished<S>4178</S> that it may glitter<S>1300</S>: should<S>176</S> we then make mirth<S>7797</S>? it contemneth<S>3988</S> the rod<S>7626</S> of my son<S>1121</S>, as every tree<S>6086</S>. <sup>it contemneth: or, it is the rod of my son, it despiseth every tree</sup>
And he hath given<S>5414</S> it to be furbished<S>4803</S>, that it may be handled<S>3709</S> <S>8610</S>: this sword<S>2719</S> is sharpened<S>2300</S>, and it is furbished<S>4178</S>, to give<S>5414</S> it into the hand<S>3027</S> of the slayer<S>2026</S>.
Cry<S>2199</S> and howl<S>3213</S>, son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>: for it shall be upon my people<S>5971</S>, it shall be upon all the princes<S>5387</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>: terrors<S>4048</S> by reason of<S>413</S> the sword<S>2719</S> shall be upon my people<S>5971</S>: smite<S>5606</S> therefore upon thy thigh<S>3409</S>. <sup>terrors: or, they are thrust down to the sword with my people</sup>
Because it is a trial<S>974</S>, and what if the sword contemn<S>3988</S> even the rod<S>7626</S>? it shall be no more, saith<S>5002</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>. <sup>Because: or, When the trial hath been, what then? shall they not also belong to the despising rod?</sup>
Thou therefore, son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, prophesy<S>5012</S>, and smite<S>5221</S> thine hands<S>3709</S> <S>3709</S> together<S>5221</S>, and let the sword<S>2719</S> be doubled<S>3717</S> the third<S>7992</S> time, the sword<S>2719</S> of the slain<S>2491</S>: it is the sword<S>2719</S> of the great<S>1419</S> men that are slain<S>2491</S>, which entereth into their privy chambers<S>2314</S>. <sup>hands: Heb. hand to hand</sup>
I have set<S>5414</S> the point<S>19</S> of the sword<S>2719</S> against all their gates<S>8179</S>, that their heart<S>3820</S> may faint<S>4127</S>, and their ruins<S>4383</S> be multiplied<S>7235</S>: ah<S>253</S>! it is made<S>6213</S> bright<S>1300</S>, it is wrapped up<S>4593</S> for the slaughter<S>2874</S>. <sup>point: or, glittering, or, fear</sup> <sup>wrapped up: or, sharpened</sup>
Go thee one way or other<S>258</S>, either on<S>7760</S> the right hand<S>3231</S>, or on the left<S>8041</S>, whithersoever<S>575</S> thy face<S>6440</S> is set<S>3259</S>. <sup>or on: Heb. set thyself, take the left hand</sup>
I will also smite<S>5221</S> mine hands<S>3709</S> together<S>3709</S>, and I will cause my fury<S>2534</S> to rest<S>5117</S>: I the LORD<S>3068</S> have said<S>1696</S> it.
The word<S>1697</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> came unto me again, saying<S>559</S>,
Also, thou son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, appoint<S>7760</S> thee two<S>8147</S> ways<S>1870</S>, that the sword<S>2719</S> of the king<S>4428</S> of Babylon<S>894</S> may come<S>935</S>: both twain<S>8147</S> shall come forth<S>3318</S> out of one<S>259</S> land<S>776</S>: and choose<S>1254</S> thou a place<S>3027</S>, choose<S>1254</S> it at the head<S>7218</S> of the way<S>1870</S> to the city<S>5892</S>.
Appoint<S>7760</S> a way<S>1870</S>, that the sword<S>2719</S> may come<S>935</S> to Rabbath<S>7237</S> of the Ammonites<S>1121</S> <S>5983</S>, and to Judah<S>3063</S> in Jerusalem<S>3389</S> the defenced<S>1219</S>.
For the king<S>4428</S> of Babylon<S>894</S> stood<S>5975</S> at the parting<S>517</S> of the way<S>1870</S>, at the head<S>7218</S> of the two<S>8147</S> ways<S>1870</S>, to use<S>7080</S> divination<S>7081</S>: he made his arrows<S>2671</S> bright<S>7043</S>, he consulted<S>7592</S> with images<S>8655</S>, he looked<S>7200</S> in the liver<S>3516</S>. <sup>parting of: Heb. mother of</sup> <sup>arrows: or, knives</sup> <sup>images: Heb. teraphim</sup>
At his right hand<S>3225</S> was the divination<S>7081</S> for Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, to appoint<S>7760</S> captains<S>3733</S>, to open<S>6605</S> the mouth<S>6310</S> in the slaughter<S>7524</S>, to lift up<S>7311</S> the voice<S>6963</S> with shouting<S>8643</S>, to appoint<S>7760</S> battering rams<S>3733</S> against the gates<S>8179</S>, to cast<S>8210</S> a mount<S>5550</S>, and to build<S>1129</S> a fort<S>1785</S>. <sup>captains: or, battering rams: Heb. rams</sup>
And it shall be unto them as a false<S>7723</S> divination<S>7080</S> in their sight<S>5869</S>, to them that have sworn<S>7650</S> oaths<S>7621</S>: but he will call to remembrance<S>2142</S> the iniquity<S>5771</S>, that they may be taken<S>8610</S>. <sup>to them: or, for the oaths made unto them</sup>
Therefore thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Because ye have made your iniquity<S>5771</S> to be remembered<S>2142</S>, in that your transgressions<S>6588</S> are discovered<S>1540</S>, so that in all your doings<S>5949</S> your sins<S>2403</S> do appear<S>7200</S>; because, I say, that ye are come to remembrance<S>2142</S>, ye shall be taken<S>8610</S> with the hand<S>3709</S>.
And thou, profane<S>2491</S> wicked<S>7563</S> prince<S>5387</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, whose day<S>3117</S> is come<S>935</S>, when<S>6256</S> iniquity<S>5771</S> shall have an end<S>7093</S>,
Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S>; Remove<S>5493</S> the diadem<S>4701</S>, and take off<S>7311</S> the crown<S>5850</S>: this shall not be the same<S>2063</S>: exalt<S>1361</S> him that is low<S>8217</S>, and abase<S>8213</S> him that is high<S>1364</S>.
I will overturn<S>5754</S>, overturn<S>5754</S>, overturn<S>5754</S>, it: and it shall be<S>7760</S> no more, until he come<S>935</S> whose right<S>4941</S> it is; and I will give<S>5414</S> it him. <sup>I will overturn: Heb. Perverted, perverted, perverted, will I make it</sup>
And thou, son<S>1121</S> of man<S>120</S>, prophesy<S>5012</S> and say<S>559</S>, Thus saith<S>559</S> the Lord<S>136</S> GOD<S>3069</S> concerning the Ammonites<S>1121</S> <S>5983</S>, and concerning their reproach<S>2781</S>; even say<S>559</S> thou, The sword<S>2719</S>, the sword<S>2719</S> is drawn<S>6605</S>: for the slaughter<S>2874</S> it is furbished<S>4803</S>, to consume<S>398</S> because of the glittering<S>1300</S>:
Whiles they see<S>2372</S> vanity<S>7723</S> unto thee, whiles they divine<S>7080</S> a lie<S>3577</S> unto thee, to bring<S>5414</S> thee upon the necks<S>6677</S> of them that are slain<S>2491</S>, of the wicked<S>7563</S>, whose day<S>3117</S> is come<S>935</S>, when<S>6256</S> their iniquity<S>5771</S> shall have an end<S>7093</S>.
Shall I cause it to return<S>7725</S> into his sheath<S>8593</S>? I will judge<S>8199</S> thee in the place<S>4725</S> where thou wast created<S>1254</S>, in the land<S>776</S> of thy nativity<S>4351</S>. <sup>Shall: or, Cause it to return</sup>
And I will pour out<S>8210</S> mine indignation<S>2195</S> upon thee, I will blow<S>6315</S> against thee in the fire<S>784</S> of my wrath<S>5678</S>, and deliver<S>5414</S> thee into the hand<S>3027</S> of brutish<S>1197</S> men<S>582</S>, and skilful<S>2796</S> to destroy<S>4889</S>. <sup>brutish: or, burning</sup>
Thou shalt be for fuel<S>402</S> to the fire<S>784</S>; thy blood<S>1818</S> shall be in the midst<S>8432</S> of the land<S>776</S>; thou shalt be no more remembered<S>2142</S>: for I the LORD<S>3068</S> have spoken<S>1696</S> it.
